title: CV
text:
You can download my full resume in PDF format below:
👉 Download Resume (PDF)



Graduate of Wuhan University of Technology, with a background in Vehicle Engineering and strong interest in marketing, data analytics, and strategic communication.
Skilled in SQL, PHP, Microsoft Office Suite, CAD, and web development. Interned at POIZON and Huawei Cloud with experience in user research, data modeling, and digital branding.





Languages & Tools: SQL, PHP, Microsoft Excel, PivotTables, VLOOKUP, MATLAB, CAD

Soft Skills: Strategic Thinking, Data Interpretation






🏆 Champion – 2020 Chinese Debate World Cup, Wuhan Division

🥇 First Prize – 2020 Bello Pegasus Debate

🥇 First Prize – 2021 Water Transport Huguang Debate

📢 Vice Leader – School Debate Team

📈 Publicity Head – 35+ WeChat articles, 200,000+ views


🔗 For more projects, see Projects
📬 Want to connect? Visit my Contact Page

title: Projects
text:
Designed and developed a machine learning-based optimization system for automotive hot stamping processes.

Built a neural network model and implemented an SQL database schema to analyze production data.

Developed a web interface using PHP, enhancing system interactivity and usability.

Conducted in-depth literature review of over 20 sources, producing a comprehensive technical report.

🛠 Tools: SQL, PHP, Machine Learning, Web Development
📚 Skills: Research, Model Design, System Implementation





Vice Leader of the university debate team, multiple award-winning speaker.
Led content creation for the school’s public account, achieving 200,000+ total views.
Directed a nationally recognized student publicity team, ranked top in national influence.

📚 Skills: Public Speaking, Copywriting, Digital Media Operations


Want to learn more? See my full resume here or get in touch here.

title: About
text:
I’m currently a graduate student at Boston University, majoring in Business analysis.
I’m passionate about data analysis, storytelling, and using technology to solve real-world business problems.
This personal site is a portfolio of my academic work, projects, and resume.
It is designed to showcase my technical and analytical skills to future employers.




Data Visualization & Business Intelligence

Marketing Analytics & Consumer Insights

Machine Learning
Tools: Python, R, Excel, Quarto, Spark
